body.p: Affiant Bryant Nichols says he did not sign a remonstrance to Gov'r Magoffin against the pardon or commutation of the sentence of Tho. B. Wadlington, nor did he ever authorize anyone to so for him -- He says he is informed his name is signed to said remonstrance, and if so he hereby utterly repudiates the mischievous forgery --
Sworn to before me by B. Nichols 178th Feby 1861 --
